extendedInfo.description: The Easy Interest Calculator is a simple tool for calculating the return from an investment.  Just enter the starting principal, term and interest rate, and see a full schedule of how your investment will grow.The app supports additional periodic deposits and calculation of interest on a monthly or annual basis.Please note that the app will calculate figures based on the information provided, however, the true value of the investment may differ due to a number of factors including, but not limited to, change in interest rates, management fees or tax charges.
